physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tenderness and enlargement of the left nipple region with an area approximately 2 cm in diameter beneath the nipple-areola complex.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient returned 3 years later with neurofibroma-related gynecomastia of the right breast localized to the nipple-areola complex.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral breast enlargement with the right side larger than the left. Tenderness on deep palpation with firm fibrous tissue measuring approximately 3 cm.
Firm, nontender masses localized to the nipple-areola complex bilaterally.
Bilateral gynecomastia with the left breast slightly larger than the right, firm and tender to deep palpation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up examination 9 years later demonstrated progression of cutaneous lesions consistent with neurofibromatosis type I.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Enlargement of the right nipple-areola complex with an associated tender mass beneath it.
Enlargement of both breasts centered around the nipple-areola complex with the left side greater than the right.
